languages.text: В Просторе Коронус у Экклезиархии нет столицы, откуда бы она направляла верующих. Если Фолстоун обретет регалии кардинальского мира, Адептус Министорум позаботятся, чтобы ставшая их оплотом планета процветала. Еретики задрожат, услышав о союзе династии фон Валанциус и Экклезиархии!

traits.locale_text: Выбить у Администратума кардинальские регалии для мира.

languages.text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!
languages.original_text: В Просторе Коронус у Экклезиархии нет столицы, откуда бы она направляла верующих. Если Фолстоун обретет регалии кардинальского мира, Адептус Министорум позаботятся, чтобы ставшая их оплотом планета процветала. Еретики задрожат, услышав о союзе династии фон Валанциус и Экклезиархии!

If Foulstone ascends to the status of a Cardinal World, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

languages.text: La Eclesiarquía no tiene una catedral en la Extensión de Koronus desde la que guiar a los fieles. Si Rocainmunda alcanza la categoría de mundo cardenalicio, el Adeptus Ministorum garantizará la prosperidad de su nuevo baluarte planetario ¡y los herejes temblarán al oír hablar de la alianza entre la dinastía von Valancius y la Eclesiarquía!
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

traits.locale_text: La Eclesiarquía no tiene una catedral en la Extensión de Koronus desde la que guiar a los fieles. Si Rocainmunda alcanza la categoría de mundo cardenalicio, el Adeptus Ministorum garantizará la prosperidad de su nuevo baluarte planetario ¡y los herejes temblarán al oír hablar de la alianza entre la dinastía von Valancius y la Eclesiarquía!

languages.text: L'Ecclésiarchie a cruellement besoin d'une capitale depuis laquelle guider les fidèles dans les Étendues de Koronus. Si Rochepeste parvenait à accéder au statut de monde cardinal, l'Adeptus Ministorum veillerait à la prospérité de ce nouveau bastion planétaire. Une telle alliance entre la maison von Valancius et l'Ecclésiarchie fera assurément trembler de peur tous les hérétiques.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

traits.locale_text: L'Ecclésiarchie a cruellement besoin d'une capitale depuis laquelle guider les fidèles dans les Étendues de Koronus. Si Rochepeste parvenait à accéder au statut de monde-cardinal, l'Adeptus Ministorum veillerait à la prospérité de ce nouveau bastion planétaire. Une telle alliance entre la maison von Valancius et l'Ecclésiarchie fera assurément trembler de peur tous les hérétiques.

languages.text: 国教在科罗努斯扩区缺少可以引导信众的首都。如果荒寂岩地能够成为国教世界，国教教会必将力保这个新据点繁荣不衰。让冯·瓦兰修斯与国教携手合作吧，让那些听到消息的异端分子瑟瑟发抖去吧！
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

traits.locale_text: 国教在科罗努斯扩区缺少可以引导信众的首都。如果荒寂岩地能够成为国教世界，国教教会必将力保这个新据点繁荣不衰。让冯·瓦兰修斯与国教携手合作吧，让那些听到消息的异端分子瑟瑟发抖去吧！

languages.text: 帝国聖教会は、コロヌス・エクスパンスに信者を導くための首都を持っていない。ファウルストーンが枢機卿座惑星の地位に昇れば、帝国宗務局は、彼らの新しい惑星の拠点の繁栄を保証するだろう。フォン・ヴァランシウス家と帝国聖教会の同盟を聞けば、異端者たちは震え上がるだろう！
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

traits.locale_text: 帝国聖教会は、コロヌス・エクスパンスに信者を導くための首都を持っていない。ファウルストーンが枢機卿座惑星の地位に昇れば、帝国宗務局は、彼らの新しい惑星の拠点の繁栄を保証するだろう。フォン・ヴァランシウス家と帝国聖教会の同盟を聞けば、異端者たちは震え上がるだろう！

languages.text: Der Ekklesiarchie fehlt eine Hauptstadt in der Koronus-Ausdehnung, von der aus sie die Gläubigen führen kann. Wenn Foulstone in den Status einer Kardinalswelt aufsteigt, wird das Adeptus Ministorum für den Wohlstand ihrer neuen planetaren Festung sorgen. Ketzer werden erzittern, wenn sie vom Bündnis zwischen dem Haus Valancius und der Ekklesiarchie erfahren!
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!

traits.locale_text: Der Ekklesiarchie fehlt eine Hauptstadt in der Koronus-Ausdehnung, von der aus sie die Gläubigen führen kann. Wenn Foulstone in den Status einer Kardinalswelt aufsteigt, wird das Adeptus Ministorum für den Wohlstand ihrer neuen planetaren Festung sorgen. Ketzer werden erzittern, wenn sie vom Bündnis zwischen dem Haus Valancius und der Ekklesiarchie erfahren!

languages.text: Ekleşiarşi'nin Koronus Enginliği'nde inananlara rehberlik edebileceği bir başkenti bulunmuyor. Menfurtaş, kardinal dünya mevkisine getirilirse Adeptus Ministorum da kalesi hâline gelecek bu gezegenin refahını sağlayacaktır. Kâfirler, von Valancius Hanesi'yle Ekleşiarşi'nin ittifakını duyduğunda korkudan titreyecek!
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy lacks a capital in the Koronus Expanse from which to guide the faithful. If Foulstone ascends to the status of a cardinal world, the Adeptus Ministorum will ensure the prosperity of their new planetary stronghold. Heretics will tremble when they hear of the alliance between House von Valancius and the Ecclesiarchy!
